name: Chordova
tagline: A local audio file player for web and mobile built with Apache Cordova.
body:
### What is Chordova?
Chordova is a web-based audio player designed to play audio files you already have on your computer or mobile device. It uses [Apache Cordova](https://cordova.apache.org/) to target mobile devices as an app (so no internet connection is required), with the possibility of future mobile-specific functionality granted through Cordova plugins, but is also able to run as a static webpage to theoretically be usable on any platform with a web browser that supports HTML5 and JavaScript.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
